item.title: pygeodyn & webgeodyn
item.description: Python packages offering data assimilation algorithms applied to geomagnetic data in the spectral domain & visualisation tools for the geomagnetic field and motions of the Earth’s liquid core

item.title: Kickoff meeting
item.description: The first meeting of the 4D Earth Core + project!

item.title: Limace.jl
item.description: Solve for linear eigenmodes of the rotating magnetohydrodynamics equations in a sphere.

item.title: Updated Virtual observatory (GVO) data
item.description: This delivery updates the preliminary geomagnetic datasets and models delivered by DTU. The report delivered at that time described in detail the datasets and processing schemes, the details of the processing schemes are unchanged.
